jobs.title: Lutron Electronics
jobs.text:
Vive Hub
Developed C++ applications and unit tests for a consumer product running an embedded Linux operating system. Conducted timing analysis on code execution time of various components of the application.
Tool & Test
Developed embedded tester hardware for testing product units against thresholds. This involved developing applications in C and C++ for 8-bit 8051 and 32-bit ARM microcontrollers as well as scripts in C#.

jobs.title: General Electric Transportation Systems
jobs.text:
Digital Solutions
Analyzed locomotive electrical schematics in order to develop instructions for adding retrofit products such as Trip Optimizer and LocoVision to exisiting locomotives.
Cable & Conduit Packaging
Supported the manufacturing Tier IV locomotives and the liquid natural gas retrofit cabling process for Tier III locomotives.

jobs.title: Kate Gleason College of Engineering
jobs.text: Conducted labs and held office hours for Embedded Systems and Digital Systems Design with HDL lab courses.
